{{Infobox battle item |name = Battle Café |image = [[File:Battle_Cafe_Modal.png|300px]] |caption = The Battle Café |location = Galar }} The '''Battle Café''' is a location found in various locations around Galar. It is used to evolve Milcery into 63 unique Alcremie forms. ==Location== You can find the Battle Café in the following locations: {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Location |- |[[Shops#Galar: Locations & Items|Motostoke]] |- |[[Shops#Galar: Locations & Items|Hammerlocke]] |- |[[Shops#Galar: Locations & Items|Wyndon]] |- |} ==Usage== To spin your Milcery you need to select one of the seven available sweets. Each sweet costs both a different amount and type of [[Berries]]. Additionally, you must select both a number of spins, and a spin direction (either clockwise or counterclockwise). Finally, the time of day impacts which Alcremie form is obtained. All of these factors combine in various permutations to yield 63 unique Alcremie forms. Ongoing spins in the Battle Café will continue even if the Café modal is closed.
It is important to note, that the time of day to obtain Alcremie forms is in line with the main series games, and not congruent with other times of day in Pokéclicker. The times are as follows: *Day - 5AM-7PM / 5:00-19:00 *Dusk - 7PM-8PM / 19:00-20:00 *Night - 7PM-5AM / 19:00-5:00 ===Sweet prices=== The following table list the prizes of the different sweets.
